pageContent: THE VOICE OF THE GODDESSI am the last glimmer of light by the SunI am the white Moon rising adorned with StarsI'm in Sea Foam, drunk to the beachfront.I am the Rose that opens to Kiss the SunBut, also, you will find me in the venom of snake that curls up on the fatal strike.I am Beautiful and horrible as LifeI'm in the Dynamics of Life and Death in Static'm Aphrodite and Hydra of ancient legends.I'm in love Lovers Cuddling, and shine the dagger that hurts.I'm White and BlackI am Mother and ProstituteIf you would love Me, you shall love the whole universe.For I am Nuit Nu Bhavani Kali
